name: Santa Ltd. Express Toy Workshop
description:
You have just arrived at your new job for a famous toy company, but the Christmas deadline comes closer and closer and the job accumulates. You’ll need to make a toy every 10 seconds or you’ll get fired!

Are you going to let all those kids have a Christmas without presents?

INSTRUCTIONS

  • Click on a toy piece and drag it
  • Drop the piece onto the empty figure
  • Try to meet the kids requests (right-hand panel) using pieces that they like and avoiding the ones they dislike

Laptop users: The game is playable with trackpad, but using a mouse is recommended
